name: Accel
description: To escape the cyber world of ACCEL you’ll have to go beyond your limits with your spaceship. In ACCEL we’re adding a new challenge, 360° maneuverability.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8 , 10 (64-bit only) Processor: i5 3570k or AMD fx 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 Storage: 2 GB available space
